parse.title: Japan Institute for Labour Policy and Training

text.*:
This article needs more links to other articles to help integrate it into the encyclopedia. Please help improve this article by adding links that are relevant to the context within the existing text. (November 2015) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)

The Japan Institute for Labour Policy and Training (独立行政法人労働政策研究・研修機構, Rōdō seisaku kenkyū kenshū kikō, JILPT) is an Independent Administrative Institution under the supervision of the Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare. The institute is concerned with working conditions and safety for members of the Japanese work force.

External links[edit]

  • The Japan Institute of Labour Policy and Training
